name: Ocean Protector (Miliardo)
description:
OCEAN PROTECTOR - HOW TO PLAY!

Welcome in the game!

It's very easy to play, after you start, the time will start and there will be junk in the ocean, you need to drago out the juck on top of the layer in order to delete it, and your objective is to delete all the 20 junk pieces you find in the ocean in the fastest time you can!

WARNING!

In the ocean there are 2 fish too! If you delete one of them you lose!

Try it out and tell your score in the comments! My best score is 11 seconds ;)

This game is basically my version of this game:

https://polymars.itch.io/sea-sweeper
